description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Awarded Gold Indie A-RPG by RPG-M Magazine. The Fall of Gods is inspired by Great Action-RPG you used to play on console,  You'll fight many Enemies, cast 12+ spells, wear 8+ armors, do rafting, find out hidden 50+ spots, sort-out 100 riddles & 12+ side-quests, drive balloon, chat with 100+ NPCs, brew potions and  swap items, unlock 10+ awards and of course : Save The World
description.short: Awarded Gold Indie A-RPG by RPG-M Magazine. The Fall of Gods is inspired by Great Action-RPG you used to play on console,  You'll fight many Enemies, cast 12+ spells, wear 8+ armors, do rafting, find out hidden 50+ spots, sort-out 100 riddles & 12+ side-quests, drive balloon, chat with 100+ NPCs, brew potions and  swap items, unlock 10+ awards and of course : Save The World
